dashboard CSS
format:
<style id="blue-dashboard">

.list-class{
    height: 0; !important
}

.device-list-button{
    width:97%; !important
    margin: 0 auto; !important
}

body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
    background:transparent;
    color: rgb(215 223 245);
}

#Production_Production{
    height: 1344px;
    /*background-color: #00000000;*/
    /*border: 0px !important;*/
}

#Production_Validated_Sensors{
    height: 1344px; !important
}
#discovered_devices{
    height: 100%;
}

ul{
    list-style-type:none;
    padding-left: 0;
    max-height:800px;
    overflow:auto;
}

li{
    
}

.list-class{
    height: auto !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-cardcontainer{
}

.nr-dashboard-theme p.label{
    font-size: 15px;
    /*padding-top: 25px;*/
    
}

.nr-dashboard-theme p{
    text-align: left !important;
    width: inherit !important;
}


.nr-dashboard-text{
    height: auto !important;
    layout-align: start start;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme p {
    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    text-align: start start;
    /*padding-bottom: 25px;*/
}

.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu{
    visibility: visible !important;
    display: block !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme table {
  border: 4px solid #555555;
  /*background-color: #555555;*/
  width: 400px;
  /*text-align: center;*/
  border-collapse: collapse;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme td, table.steelBlueCols th {
  border: 1px solid #555555;
  padding: 5px 10px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme tbody td {
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #FFFFFF;
}
/*.nr-dashboard-theme td:nth-child(even) {*/
/*  background: #398AA4;*/
/*}*/
.nr-dashboard-theme thead {
  background: #398AA4;
  border-bottom: 10px solid #398AA4;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme thead th {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #FFFFFF;
  text-align: left;
  border-left: 2px solid #398AA4;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme thead th:first-child {
  border-left: none;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme tfoot td {
  font-size: 13px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme tfoot .links {
  text-align: right;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme tfoot .links a{
  display: inline-block;
  background: #FFFFFF;
  color: #398AA4;
  padding: 2px 8px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

</style>
